name: KeeperRL + Soundtrack
description:
The pack includes:
  • KeeperRL base game
  • KeeperRL Official Soundtrack
KeeperRL KeeperRL is an ambitious dungeon simulator with roguelike and RPG elements. Take the role of an evil wizard and study the methods of black magic. Equip your minions and explore the world, murder innocent villagers and burn their homes. Build your dungeon, lay traps and prepare for an assault of angry heroes.
KeeperRL Official Soundtrack The original KeeperRL soundtrack in 320kbps MP3's format. 35 tracks and over 100 minutes of music. Includes fantasy tracks composed by Krzysztof Łoza as well as the classic piano pieces by Marcin Brzozowski.
